text:
I am impressed by Pandan Sparks Team staff, Sheik’s outstanding services.
Today, I was 10 minutes early before 8:00am. Sheik was already in the Office. He immediately attended to me in understanding my car’s problem.
While the car is in the workshop, Sheik came forward to enlighten me on how to follow up and have my car engine running smoothly.
My overall experience has been awesome.  I highly commend Sheik’s professionalism and helpfulness.

Excellent Car Servicing!

I recently brought my car in for servicing, and I am extremely satisfied with the experience. The staff was professional, friendly, and knowledgeable. They took the time to explain everything clearly and ensured my car was well taken care of. The service was efficient, and my car feels great after the maintenance.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for reliable and quality car servicing!

I wanted to check my car ac system as there was a stale smell,  received a call to come on Sat morning however when i went there was no slot made for me. Thankfully Mr Sheik and a nice sister Madam who was manning the customer service counter were able to take my car in still. They were very polite andd explained to me what steps were to be taken and my options. The problem was fixed within 2hrs of me waiting there and the cost was very affordable too. Mr Sheik was extremely helpful and kind as he also advised me on what to look out for after the servicing. Overall it was a pleasant experience. It would really be great if coffee and tea (and biscuits) are served as there are no F&B options around at all.

we had an urgent issue with our company vehicle, and Sheik was incredibly helpful and responsive in getting it fixed. he acted promptly and ensured everything was resolved smoothly, minimizing any downtime for us. his professionalism and efficiency made a stressful situation much easier to handle. highly recommend Sheik for his excellent service and reliability!

Sheik attended to my car issues with great patience and was very helpful in explaining the processes. He took time to answer my queries which ate into his lunch time. I appreciate his time and effort and will like to commend him on his excellent service!
